trans-unit.source: Elastic Database client library overview
trans-unit.target: Elastic Database client library overview

trans-unit.source: The **Elastic Database client library** helps you easily develop sharded applications using hundreds—or even thousands—of Azure SQL databases hosted on Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: The **Elastic Database client library** helps you easily develop sharded applications using hundreds—or even thousands—of Azure SQL databases hosted on Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: Such designs are commonly used for Software as a Service (SaaS) applications, which are typically single tenant architectures--where each tenant is provisioned with a database.
trans-unit.target: Such designs are commonly used for Software as a Service (SaaS) applications, which are typically single tenant architectures--where each tenant is provisioned with a database.

trans-unit.source: Building and managing such an application is a goal of the library.
trans-unit.target: Building and managing such an application is a goal of the library.

trans-unit.source: The client library is a .NET Framework library that can be installed into any application project using [Visual Studio](sql-database-elastic-scale-add-references-visual-studio.md) and [Nuget](http://go.microsoft.com/?linkid=9862605).
trans-unit.target: The client library is a .NET Framework library that can be installed into any application project using [Visual Studio](sql-database-elastic-scale-add-references-visual-studio.md) and [Nuget](http://go.microsoft.com/?linkid=9862605).

trans-unit.source: The client library is part of Elastic Database tools which is specifically an [Elastic Database feature](sql-database-elastic-scale-introduction.md).
trans-unit.target: The client library is part of Elastic Database tools which is specifically an [Elastic Database feature](sql-database-elastic-scale-introduction.md).

trans-unit.source: Elastic scale capabilities
trans-unit.target: Elastic scale capabilities

trans-unit.source: **Shard Map Management**: To manage an collection of shards, a speical database called the "shard map manager" is created.
trans-unit.target: **Shard Map Management**: To manage an collection of shards, a speical database called the "shard map manager" is created.

trans-unit.source: Shard map management is the ability for an application to manage various metadata about its shards.
trans-unit.target: Shard map management is the ability for an application to manage various metadata about its shards.

trans-unit.source: Developers can use this functionality to register databases as shards, describe mappings of individual sharding keys or key ranges to those databases, and maintain this metadata as the number and composition of databases evolves to reflect capacity changes.
trans-unit.target: Developers can use this functionality to register databases as shards, describe mappings of individual sharding keys or key ranges to those databases, and maintain this metadata as the number and composition of databases evolves to reflect capacity changes.

trans-unit.source: Without the elastic database client library, you would need to spend a lot of time writing the management code when implementing sharding.
trans-unit.target: Without the elastic database client library, you would need to spend a lot of time writing the management code when implementing sharding.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Shard map management](sql-database-elastic-scale-shard-map-management.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Shard map management](sql-database-elastic-scale-shard-map-management.md).

trans-unit.source: **Data dependent routing**: Imagine a request coming into the application.
trans-unit.target: **Data dependent routing**: Imagine a request coming into the application.

trans-unit.source: Based on the sharding key value of the request, the application needs to determine the correct database that holds the data for this key value, and then open a connection to it to process the request.
trans-unit.target: Based on the sharding key value of the request, the application needs to determine the correct database that holds the data for this key value, and then open a connection to it to process the request.

trans-unit.source: Data dependent routing provides the ability to open connections with a single easy call into the shard map of the application.
trans-unit.target: Data dependent routing provides the ability to open connections with a single easy call into the shard map of the application.

trans-unit.source: Data dependent routing was another area of infrastructure code that is now covered by functionality in the elastic database client library.
trans-unit.target: Data dependent routing was another area of infrastructure code that is now covered by functionality in the elastic database client library.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Data dependent routing](sql-database-elastic-scale-data-dependent-routing.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Data dependent routing](sql-database-elastic-scale-data-dependent-routing.md).

trans-unit.source: **Multi-shard queries (MSQ)**: Multi-shard querying works when a request involves several (or all) shards.
trans-unit.target: **Multi-shard queries (MSQ)**: Multi-shard querying works when a request involves several (or all) shards.

trans-unit.source: A multi-shard query executes the same T-SQL code on all shards or a set of shards.
trans-unit.target: A multi-shard query executes the same T-SQL code on all shards or a set of shards.

trans-unit.source: The results from the participating shards are merged into an overall result set using UNION ALL semantics.
trans-unit.target: The results from the participating shards are merged into an overall result set using UNION ALL semantics.

trans-unit.source: The functionality as exposed through the client library handles many tasks, including: connection management, thread management, fault handling and intermediate results processing.
trans-unit.target: The functionality as exposed through the client library handles many tasks, including: connection management, thread management, fault handling and intermediate results processing.

trans-unit.source: MSQ can query up to hundreds of shards.
trans-unit.target: MSQ can query up to hundreds of shards.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Multi-shard querying](sql-database-elastic-scale-multishard-querying.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Multi-shard querying](sql-database-elastic-scale-multishard-querying.md).

trans-unit.source: In general, customers using elastic database tools can expect to get full T-SQL functionality when submitting shard-local operations as opposed to cross-shard operations that have their own semantics.
trans-unit.target: In general, customers using elastic database tools can expect to get full T-SQL functionality when submitting shard-local operations as opposed to cross-shard operations that have their own semantics.
